about_the_game:
An unknown number of years ago, you volunteered to participate in a scientific study – a study that wasn't for the faint of heart. You were chosen due to your resilience to the various tests of your mind and body. You weren't the only one the scientists selected for their experiments, because there were others just like you. Each of you was put into groups of eight and induced into a cryosleep for a few months, but what was supposed to be months became years.

Your eyes slowly opened and your senses came back as you remembered where you were. It felt as though you were brought back from the dead and this made you wonder how long you were in cryosleep. You noticed that the doctors and scientists had vanished, machines were no longer operational, and there was an eerie silence.

What happened here?


  • Player Hosting & Passwords - It is up to you whether or not you want to host a server for other players to join. In doing so, you can make it a requirement for other players to provide a password. Play with friends or random players. The choice is yours!
  • New Game = New World - Each time a new game is made, the world is randomly-generated. This means that your world is strictly unique to you. No one else is exploring the world you are in. Unless you're playing with them, of course.
  • Character Customization - Create a character that is unique to you! Choose from a variety of head types, hairstyles and colors, and skin tones.
  • Revive System - Your friends and even your enemies will be able to revive you when you are downed. Don't want them to? No need to worry! You can easily cancel at any point during the 30-second countdown timer.
  • Enemies Change As You Level Up - Do not be surprised to find new enemies roaming the world as you gain levels. Each biome will have different enemies wielding a variety of weapons to keep you on your toes.
  • Vehicles & Vehicle Storage - Across the world, you'll find locked garages with a random vehicle stored within. To unlock each garage, you'll need a key that can be found in containers or enemy loot drops. Keep an eye out and you may even find a vehicle that you can store your items in!
  • Crafting & Building - There are a plethora of weapons and armor for you to craft to have a better chance of survival. Build yourself a home and upgrade it when you have the required materials.
  • Gliders & Cryo-Pads - Traverse the world quicker than being on foot by getting to higher ground and using your glider. Can't find any high ground? Craft yourself a Cryo-Pad! Cryo-Pads are devices designed to create powerful gusts of air vertically and can be quite useful to anyone using a glider.
  • Dungeons & Dungeon Bosses - In every biome, there are dungeons. These dungeons are designed to match their home biome and each one has a specific boss. Make it through the dungeons, defeat the bosses, and get closer to the truth.

name: Cryowakers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti or Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Cryowakers is an exploration and survival game that takes place in a randomly-generated futuristic world. Play solo or with seven other players to explore, survive, build, and fight to uncover the truth behind the cryosleep experiments.
